text: Sered lyudey ye taki, yaki prypysuyutʹ Allahu rivnykh Yomu ta lyublyatʹ yikh tak, yak lyublyatʹ Allaha. Ale zh ti, yaki uviruvaly, lyublyatʹ Allaha shche sylʹnishe! Yakby zh nechestyvtsi, pobachyvshy karu, pobachyly b shche y te, shcho vsya syla nalezhytʹ same Allahu, i shcho Vin — suvoryy u pokaranni
